newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Port conditions update -Sri Lanka- Lloyds Shipping.
newsitem.headline: Port conditions update -Sri Lanka- Lloyds Shipping.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --

COLOMBO, Nov 19 - Thirteen container dishargers/loaders, one oil discharger, six food dischargers, four general cargo dischargers, three fertiliser dischargers, and one vehicle discharger presently working. Nine container vessels, one gas discharger, one cement discharger, one sugar discharger, one fertiliser discharger, and one transhipment cargo loader awaiting berths.
